#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int binarySearch(int key,vector<int> vv){
	int lo = 0, hi = vv.size();
	while(lo <= hi)
	{
		int mid = (lo+hi)/2;
		if(vv[mid] == key)
			return mid;
		else if(vv[mid] < key)
			lo = mid + 1;
		else if(vv[mid] > key)
			hi = mid - 1;
	}
	return -1;
}


int main(){
	int t,n,p;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int A_cnt = 0, B_cnt = 0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		vector<int> A(n);
		vector<int> B(n);
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
			scanf("%d",&A[i]);
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
			scanf("%d",&B[i]);
		int p,ans = 0,cont = 0;
		scanf("%d",&p);
		while(p!=0){
			if(cont == 1){
				scanf("%d",&p);
				continue;
			}
			for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
				if(A[i] == p)
				{
					A[i] = -1;
					A_cnt += 1;
				}
				if(B[i] == p)
				{
					B[i] = -1; 
					B_cnt += 1;
				}
			}
			if(A_cnt == n && B_cnt == n){ ans = 3;cont =1;}
			if(A_cnt == n && B_cnt != n){ ans = 1;cont =1;}
			if(A_cnt != n && B_cnt == n){ ans = 2;cont =1;}
			scanf("%d",&p);	
		}
		switch(ans)
		{
			case 0 : printf("0\n");break;
			case 1 : printf("MIKE\n");break;
			case 2 : printf("HARVEY\n");break;
			case 3 : printf("MIKE HARVEY\n");break;
			default : printf("0\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
